{"id":527324750,"lang":"cpp","time":"7 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1627096182,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"24 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/527324750/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Wildcard Matching","memory":"7.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool isMatch(string s, string p) {\n        int n1=s.size(),n2=p.size();\n        bool dp[n1+1][n2+1];\n        for(int i=0;i<=n1;i++){\n            for(int j=0;j<=n2;j++){\n                if(i==0 && j==0)dp[i][j]=true;\n                else if(i==0)dp[i][j]=p[j-1]=='*' && dp[i][j-1];\n                else if(j==0) dp[i][j]=false;\n                else if(p[j-1]=='*') dp[i][j]=dp[i-1][j]||dp[i][j-1];\n                else if(s[i-1]==p[j-1]||p[j-1]=='?')dp[i][j]=dp[i-1][j-1];\n                else dp[i][j]=false;                \n            }\n        }\n        return dp[n1][n2];\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"wildcard-matching"}
